metadata.title: CVE-2024-22099 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernel onLinux, x86, ARM (net, bluetooth modules) allows Overflow Buffers. Thisvulnerability is associated with program files/net/bluetooth/rfcomm/core.C.This issue affects Linux kernel: v2.6.12-rc2.
